video.title: Reign
video.synopsis: This vivid historical drama series tells of the rise to power of Mary, Queen of Scots, amid a court full of sexual and political intrigue.

episodes.synopsis: Teenage Mary Stuart travels to France to meet her fianc√©, Prince Francis, although his mother, Queen Catherine, wants to prevent their marriage.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Mary and Francis seek to convince the English that their engagement is strong, while Catherine hunts a witness who could expose her plot against Mary.
episodes.title: Snakes in the Garden

episodes.synopsis: King Henry of France refuses to help Mary fight English invaders in Scotland, so she considers forging an alliance with Portugal through marriage.
episodes.title: Kissed

episodes.synopsis: Mary is forced to lie to help her country, and Francis and Bash make startling discoveries about Tomas, prompting Mary to reconsider his proposal.
episodes.title: Hearts and Minds

episodes.synopsis: The path to true love grows more complicated as Francis is tempted by an old flame, Mary indulges in a kiss, and Kenna continues an illicit affair.
episodes.title: A Chill in the Air

episodes.synopsis: Bash concocts a bloody scheme to save Mary when she is targeted by the pagans, and Francis's jealousy leads him to seek comfort with Olivia.
episodes.title: Chosen

episodes.synopsis: Mary and Catherine form an unlikely alliance when the castle is held hostage, and Diane plots to make Henry acknowledge Bash as his legitimate heir.
episodes.title: Left Behind

episodes.synopsis: Henry is pushing for Mary and Francis to wed, but Nostradamus's prediction makes Mary apprehensive. Catherine is angered by Diane's plans for Bash.
episodes.title: Fated

episodes.synopsis: The stakes for France are high when a conflicted Mary persuades Henry to make a decision that endangers the legitimacy of his and Catherine's sons.
episodes.title: For King and Country

episodes.synopsis: Mary becomes involved with an imprisoned pregnant woman with ties to Bash, while Mary's friends are entangled in Catherine's assassination attempts.
episodes.title: Sacrifice

episodes.synopsis: Startling secrets about Catherine's past are revealed when Henry has her arrested, but Catherine tries to assuage him with evidence against Bash.
episodes.title: Inquisition

episodes.synopsis: Clarissa's outlandish actions cause concern, forcing Mary and Bash to work with Catherine. Francis grows close to Lola when he helps her in Paris.
episodes.title: Royal Blood

episodes.synopsis: The royals amp up the meddling when Catherine and Mary's mother pressure Mary to choose between Bash and Francis, resulting in disappointment for one.
episodes.title: The Consummation

episodes.synopsis: Henry needs Catherine's help to avert a crisis, Mary discovers the identity of the father of Lola's baby and Bash rescues a damsel in the woods.
episodes.title: Dirty Laundry

episodes.synopsis: Bash investigates the supposed creature in the woods while Mary pressures Lola to marry, Greer is torn between suitors and Henry grows more violent.
episodes.title: The Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Francis and Bash want to reconcile, although Henry interferes by ordering one of them to wed his own mistress. Greer reluctantly accepts a proposal.
episodes.title: Monsters

episodes.synopsis: Mary learns of a deadly secret clause in her marriage contract and threatens to reveal Henry's illness to the world if the contract is not destroyed.
episodes.title: Liege Lord

episodes.synopsis: Francis takes drastic action to save Mary from a killer, while Catherine and Kenna team up to trick Henry into renouncing his ruthless new mistress.
episodes.title: No Exit

episodes.synopsis: Mary tries to save Scotland from an uprising and is infuriated when Francis hijacks her uncle's army to use for his own battle against the English.
episodes.title: Toy Soldiers

episodes.synopsis: Mary hires an unscrupulous mercenary to aid Scotland, while Francis and Leith fight the English, and Lola has doubts about her husband's sincerity.
episodes.title: Higher Ground

episodes.synopsis: Loyalties are tested when Lola learns the truth about Julien, Henry decides that he wants to wed Mary, and Bash hunts for the terror in the woods.
episodes.title: Long Live the King

episodes.synopsis: Henry's reign is threatened by a coup, Francis rushes to Lola's side as she gives birth, and Mary prepares to defend the castle against the plague.
episodes.title: Slaughter of Innocence

episodes.synopsis: As the plague sweeps the country, Francis leaves to search for Lola and his child; Mary and Catherine try to stay safe while others perish.
episodes.title: The Plague

episodes.synopsis: As the plague fades, Francis returns home with Lola and his son, causing tension with Mary. A powerful lord confronts Mary about his son's death.
episodes.title: Drawn and Quartered

episodes.synopsis: As a post-plague famine sweeps across France, Mary is desperate to find a way to feed the starving masses. Meanwhile, Catherine plans the coronation.
episodes.title: Coronation

episodes.synopsis: Francis prepares for his son's christening; Mary and Lola bond over their desire to help a woman in need; Mary receives life-changing news.
episodes.title: The Lamb and the Slaughter

episodes.synopsis: The eve of Greer's wedding is marked by bloodshed. Francis tries to hide his past from Mary and fears the secret will destroy him.
episodes.title: Blood for Blood

episodes.synopsis: A peasant uprising forces Mary and Catherine into the woods while Francis searches for them; Lola and Narcisse bond to satisfy mutual needs.
episodes.title: Three Queens

episodes.synopsis: Catherine's daughter shows up, unexpectedly creating a rivalry with Kenna; Narcisse pressures Francis to defy his conscience or risk his throne.
episodes.title: The Prince of the Blood

episodes.synopsis: The fight between Protestants and Catholics is worsened by demands from a Vatican emissary; Claude suspects Catherine wants to get rid of her.
episodes.title: Terror of the Faithful

episodes.synopsis: As Protestant-Catholic violence reaches a pinnacle, Mary considers a solution to bring both sides closer and solve the issue of Claude's marriage.
episodes.title: Acts of War

episodes.synopsis: Francis is plagued by guilt over the attack on Mary and vows to find her assailants; meanwhile, Catherine receives a ghostly visitor in the night.
episodes.title: Mercy

episodes.synopsis: Mary and Cond√© try to hide from Vatican inquisitors, while Kenna tries to explain Catherine's madness and violent intent to Princess Claude.
episodes.title: Getaway

episodes.synopsis: Cond√© and Francis's rivalry for Mary intensifies. After being confronted by Claude, Catherine's hallucinations lead her to consider suicide.
episodes.title: Banished

episodes.synopsis: As the Feast of Renewal arrives at the castle, Francis has hopes of reconciling with Mary; Catherine learns the truth about her hallucinations.
episodes.title: Sins of the Past

episodes.synopsis: Mary and Francis learn of the connection between Henry's and Catherine's "madness." A visit from one of Catherine's suitors makes Narcisse jealous.
episodes.title: The End of Mourning

episodes.synopsis: Mary's mother visits, cautioning Mary about her decision to live apart from Francis; meanwhile, Francis wants his son to marry into a powerful family.
episodes.title: Forbidden

episodes.synopsis: Antoine threatens to expose Mary and Cond√©'s emotional affair to Francis; meanwhile, Bash uncovers Kenna's plot, further destroying their marriage.
episodes.title: Tasting Revenge

episodes.synopsis: Catherine visits Francis to expose Mary and Cond√©'s relationship, but Francis falls ill and collapses; Leith becomes Claude's personal guard.
episodes.title: Tempting Fate

episodes.synopsis: With Francis ill, Mary serves as commander in chief and devises a plan to save Scotland; Catherine continues her plot to expose Mary's infidelity.
episodes.title: Reversal of Fortune

episodes.synopsis: Despite being grateful to Francis for saving Scotland, Mary refuses to leave Cond√©. But following a terrorist threat, Mary and Francis reconnect.
episodes.title: Abandoned

episodes.synopsis: Cond√©'s alliance with England raises Francis's resolve to destroy him, while Catherine insists Narcisse prove his devotion by betraying Lola.
episodes.title: Fugitive

episodes.synopsis: While Cond√©'s plan to take the castle draws near, Mary puts herself in danger to warn Francis; Narcisse suffers the wrath of Catherine's jealousy.
episodes.title: The Siege

episodes.synopsis: Mary resolves to destroy Cond√©'s revolution; Catherine's desire to ruin Mary involves Queen Elizabeth; Kenna's secret seals her and Bash's fate.
episodes.title: Burn

episodes.synopsis: As Queen Elizabeth and Queen Catherine join forces, Queen Mary struggles to hang on to her power. Meanwhile, Elizabeth faces challenges of her own.
episodes.title: Three Queens, Two Tigers

episodes.synopsis: Elizabeth faces political backlash for protecting Catherine, who is imprisoned when she returns to France. Mary must make some difficult decisions.
episodes.title: Betrothed

episodes.synopsis: When King Antoine unexpectedly returns to Court, Mary must help Francis hide his weakening condition long enough to secure his family's future.
episodes.title: Extreme Measures

episodes.synopsis: After Mary receives an urgent message from her ailing mother about the dire situation in Scotland, she finds herself looking to Francis for aid.
episodes.title: The Price

episodes.synopsis: Grateful for a future with a revived Francis, Mary considers signing away her claim to the English throne. Catherine learns that Nostradamus is back.
episodes.title: In a Clearing

episodes.synopsis: Mary realizes she must help Catherine in her quest to become regent, no matter the cost. Elizabeth struggles with the prospect of losing Dudley.
episodes.title: Fight or Flight

episodes.synopsis: When Prince Don Carlos of Spain visits France, Mary learns he has a dark secret. Suspicions arise about the intentions of the new English ambassador.
episodes.title: The Hound and the Hare

episodes.synopsis: Mary and Catherine deal with the aftermath of Prince Don Carlos's accident. Mary contemplates her future. Catherine is accused of poisoning Francis.
episodes.title: Our Undoing

episodes.synopsis: Mary becomes suspicious about Prince Don Carlos's true condition. Elizabeth makes a shocking discovery which could affect her reign over England.
episodes.title: Wedlock

episodes.synopsis: Mary tries to resist her feelings for Gideon as she works to align herself politically. Catherine and Narcisse continue their vicious power struggle.
episodes.title: Bruises That Lie

episodes.synopsis: As Charles's coronation approaches, Mary searches for a powerful suitor to align with. Lola discovers the truth about who targeted Elizabeth.
episodes.title: Succession

episodes.synopsis: Mary weighs her options as she and Gideon find themselves in uncharted emotional territory. Meanwhile, Catherine's past comes back to haunt her.
episodes.title: No Way Out

episodes.synopsis: After putting Gideon in danger, Mary turns to another Englishman for help. Bash vows to track down the men behind the threats to Catherine.
episodes.title: Strange Bedfellows

episodes.synopsis: Mary realizes that she must return to Scotland and raise her own army to save her throne. Lola helps Elizabeth find out more about her mother.
episodes.title: To the Death

episodes.synopsis: Mary learns that she has a chance to get to Scotland safely. But when Catherine faces a crisis, Mary ponders whether to stay and protect her.
episodes.title: Safe Passage

episodes.synopsis: Mary arrives in Scotland and realizes she must keep her royal identity a secret. Lola's efforts to help Elizabeth raise the Queen's suspicions.
episodes.title: Clans

episodes.synopsis: With Mary presumed dead, Elizabeth and John Knox each plot to take the Scottish throne. Meanwhile, Mary and Bash face a dangerous enemy.
episodes.title: Intruders

episodes.synopsis: While Elizabeth battles Mary for control of Scotland, Lola is accused of a terrible crime. Charles returns to France a changed man.
episodes.title: Spiders in a Jar

episodes.synopsis: Mary tests her brother's loyalty after hearing of his meeting with John Knox. Elizabeth agrees to help Lord Darnley, but she has ulterior motives.
episodes.title: With Friends Like These

episodes.synopsis: When Mary receives alarming news, she suspects there's a traitor in the ranks. Elizabeth enlists Narcisse in a plot to bring down Knox.
episodes.title: A Grain of Deception

episodes.synopsis: Mary gets a proposal from Gideon, with a promise from Elizabeth attached. But a chat with Lord Darnley's mother makes her think twice about accepting.
episodes.title: Leaps of Faith

episodes.synopsis: Mary gets to know Darnley. To avoid being sent to a nunnery, Claude accepts an arranged marriage. Charles's behavior becomes increasingly disturbing.
episodes.title: Playing with Fire

episodes.synopsis: A child's disappearance in the woods leads to alarming rumors about Charles. To win over the clan leaders, Darnley accepts a boxing challenge.
episodes.title: Highland Games

episodes.synopsis: Elizabeth orders Darnley's return to England -- by force, if necessary. Catherine and Narcisse try to hide the Charles's disappearance from Leeza.
episodes.title: Love and Death

episodes.synopsis: Catherine tracks down a revitalized Charles, who makes a shocking announcement upon his return home. James finds Darnley in a compromising situation.
episodes.title: Hanging Swords

episodes.synopsis: Nicole is tasked with bringing Charles back to Catholicism. Mary learns the identity of the Loyal Watchman, and later receives a mysterious prophecy.
episodes.title: Uncharted Waters

episodes.synopsis: Mary gets news that all but seals her fate with Darnley, but later learns he's secretly meeting with the Vatican. Knox discovers his wife's affair.
episodes.title: Pulling Strings

episodes.synopsis: Elizabeth seeks a Catholic husband. A hostage situation decides whether Charles must abdicate. Knox's wife reveals an assassination plot to James.
episodes.title: A Better Man

episodes.synopsis: When Darnley is again denied the Crown Matrimonial, he threatens to reveal Mary's plan to seize England. Henry drops a bombshell that rattles Charles.
episodes.title: Dead of Night

episodes.synopsis: Elizabeth and Gideon's romance is discovered. Desperate to appear strong, Charles commits a serious diplomatic error. Knox makes Darnley an offer.
episodes.title: The Shakedown

episodes.synopsis: Those conspiring against Mary accuse her of adultery and make a scapegoat of a man close to her. Henry opens Nicole's eyes to Narcisse's true nature.
episodes.title: Coup de Grace

episodes.synopsis: Against Bothwell's advice, Mary entrusts Darnley to help her capture the Privy Council members for arrest. Narcisse avenges his wife's death.
episodes.title: A Bride. A Box. A Body.

episodes.synopsis: When Mary goes into labor, Darnley's mother takes advantage of her absence to influence her son, who exhibits troubling mental and physical symptoms.
episodes.title: Blood in the Water

episodes.synopsis: Knowing her mentally ill husband could get legal custody of her son, Mary accepts Bothwell's offer to eliminate him, a decision which seals her fate.
episodes.title: All It Cost Her...
